lead_paragraph: The story of a group of American rowers and its quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics tops the list of best-selling sports books for November 2015, according to the New York Times best-seller list.

headline.print_headline: The Best Sellers: Filed Under Sports

snippet: The story of a group of American rowers and its quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics tops the list of best-selling sports books for November 2015, according to the New York Times best-seller list.
